hero.title: Healthy Fingerlings for Your Best Yield
hero.subtitle: Specializing in high-quality Tilapia and Catfish fingerlings, ready for your pond. Our fingerlings are carefully selected for genetics, health, and fast growth potential.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Providing comprehensive fingerling solutions for successful aquaculture operations

qualityGuarantee.title: Quality Guarantee
qualityGuarantee.description: Premium genetics ensure healthy, fast-growing fingerlings with superior survival rates and optimal growth potential for your aquaculture operation.

flexibleBatches.title: Flexible Batches
flexibleBatches.description: Various batch sizes available from small-scale to commercial operations, with secure transport and delivery options nationwide.

expertAdvice.title: Expert Advice
expertAdvice.description: Comprehensive consultation services including pond preparation guidance, feeding recommendations, and ongoing support for maximum yield.

contact.title: Ready to Order Your Next Batch?
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us for premium fingerlings and expert aquaculture advice

footer.description: Your trusted partner for premium quality fingerlings and professional aquaculture solutions. Serving fish farmers across Thailand with excellence and expertise.
